messages.subject: Peabody conference and chocolate
messages.msgSnippet: That s exactly how I would describe it, now that you ve said it.  Dh was gobbling it up like it was a buffet!  He just posted some really nice words on
messages.messageBody:
" That's exactly how I would describe it, now that you've
said it. Dh was gobbling it up like it was a buffet! He just posted
some really nice words on SSUDs, if you have access."

I am not a member at that list, but Kelly forwarded his post to me and
I sat here with tears in my eyes and felt SO incredibly honored by his
kind words! wow.

Let him know he made my day.:)

And COOL about the chocolate connection!
I may be spending the rest of my life looking for chocolate in strange
places. I hear the Wasabe leaves a slight burn in the nose but is
terrific! I'll let you know later this month after I try it.

Ren
learninginfreedom.com
